note: Sensory enhancement/deprivation scenes - blindfold, temperature, texture. Focus on heightening or restricting senses.

scenes.generation_prompt: naked woman lying on bed wearing black silk blindfold, naked man beside her with hands approaching her body, she anticipating touch, bedroom

user_description.en: Eyes covered, world reduced to sensation. Every touch a surprise, every caress amplified. Not knowing what comes next makes everything more intense.
user_description.ru: Повязка на глазах. Не видит что будет дальше, каждое прикосновение — сюрприз.

ai_context.description: Blindfold play. Visual deprivation heightens other senses. Entry-level sensory play. Anticipation and surprise.

question_angles.as_receiver: Do you enjoy being blindfolded during sex?
question_angles.as_giver: Do you enjoy blindfolding your partner?
question_angles.emotional: What does not being able to see add to the experience?

taboo_context.normalization: One of the most popular sensory enhancements—most couples have tried or would enjoy blindfold play

scenes.generation_prompt: naked woman lying on back on bed, naked man trailing ice cube along her stomach and chest, water droplets on her warm skin, goosebumps visible, her gasping at cold sensation, bedroom

user_description.ru: Кубик льда скользит по горячему телу. Контраст холода и тепла.

ai_context.description: Ice play / cold sensation. Temperature contrast on aroused body. Testing interest in cold sensation as arousal.

question_angles.as_receiver: Does ice on your body during sex turn you on?
question_angles.as_giver: Do you enjoy using ice on your partner?
question_angles.emotional: What does temperature contrast add to sensation?

taboo_context.normalization: Common sensory play—the contrast between hot aroused body and cold ice creates intense sensation

scenes.generation_prompt: naked woman lying on back, naked man holding lit candle above her dripping hot wax onto her stomach, red wax pooling on her skin, her face showing mix of pain and pleasure, dim candlelit bedroom

user_description.en: Hot wax drips onto waiting skin, each drop a burst of heat that fades to warmth. Pain and pleasure blur together in trails of solidifying wax.

ai_context.description: Wax play - hot candle wax dripped on body. Pain/pleasure mix. Temperature play with controlled 'danger'. BDSM adjacent.

question_angles.as_receiver: Does hot wax on your body turn you on?
question_angles.as_giver: Would you enjoy dripping wax on your partner?

taboo_context.normalization: Use massage candles or soy candles with low melting point—when done safely, creates unique sensation

scenes.generation_prompt: naked woman lying on back on bed, naked man tracing white feather along her neck and chest, she giggling and squirming from light tickling sensation, bedroom

scenes.generation_prompt: naked woman lying on bed wearing black blindfold and noise-canceling headphones, wrists bound to headboard with soft rope, naked man approaching her unseen and unheard, dim bedroom

user_description.en: Sight gone. Sound gone. Floating in darkness and silence, waiting. Every nerve alive, desperate for any sensation. Complete surrender to the void.
user_description.ru: Повязка на глазах плюс наушники. Полная сенсорная депривация.

question_angles.emotional: What would being cut off from all senses feel like?

taboo_context.normalization: Advanced play requiring strong trust and clear safety signals—profoundly intense for those who enjoy it
